name: get_price_by_styleids_and_siteid_zappos_1_6pm_2
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool zappos_2022.
Tool description: ZAPPOS NEW ENDPOINTS
API description: Fetch the price information for specific style IDs and site ID from the Zappos API.

siteid.description: The site ID for which the price information is requested.

styleids.description: The style IDs for which the price information is requested.
